summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East Highland Drive, from 24th Avenue North to 25th Avenue North; and a certain alley, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 14700 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
